PC Number: 2017-1100

Date: 2017-08-17

Whereas the Honourable Benjamin Taylor, Judge of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, hereby

 

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Benjamin Taylor; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Benjamin Taylor an annuity of $210,200, to commence on the date of the making of this Order in Council and continuing during his life.

 


 

Attendu que l’honorable Benjamin Taylor, juge de la Cour suprême de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard, a donné sa démission pour incapacité par suite d’une infirmité permanente,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation de la ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil:

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Benjamin Taylor;

 

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Benjamin Taylor une pension viagère annuelle de 210 200 $ payable, à compter de la date de prise du présent décret.
